location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'INDEX MAP OF GAZETTEER AND ROUTES IN PERSIA'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 215 x 280mm, on sheet 290 x 360mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the whole of Persia with portions of adjacent countries, and indicates the extents of the coverage of each volume of the Gazetteer and Routes of Persia, cities, towns and hydrology. Administrative regions and boundaries are shown in red.The map was prepared by the Simla Drawing Office and heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Calcutta. A printing statement reads 'S.D.O. No. 1756, Jan. 1917.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
